item.title: [PI] not allowing command in wildy
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

Okay so i got a command, ::infpray (which give 9999k prayer) and ::infhp (give 9999k hp) , whats could i do so they could use the command in wildy?

Infpray command

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("infpray") && (c.playerRights >= 1)) {
                                                c.getPA().requestUpdates();
                                                c.playerLevel[5] = 99999;
                                                c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
                                                c.gfx0(310);
                                                c.startAnimation(4304);
                                                c.sendMessage("You have inf prayer cause Love demands it.");
                        }

infpray command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("infhp") && (c.playerRights >= 3)) {
                                                c.getPA().requestUpdates();
                                                c.playerLevel[3] = 99999;
                                                c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
                                                c.gfx0(1555);
                                                c.sendMessage("You have inf hp cause Love has demanded it.");
                        }

Read full topic
